message.content:
Here is a sample healthy meal plan for you that does not include any of the ingredients you mentioned:

Breakfast: Oatmeal with berries and nuts (such as walnuts or almonds)
Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus
Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers) and a side of quinoa
Snack: Apple slices with almond butter
Dinner: Baked salmon with sweet potato and green beans

This meal plan includes a variety of protein sources (chicken, fish, and salmon), healthy fats (avocado, olive oil, and nuts), and complex carbohydrates (quinoa) to provide sustained energy. It also includes a range of vegetables for fiber and vitamins.

Please note that this is just an example meal plan and you should consult with a healthcare professional or registered dietitian to determine the best meal plan for your specific needs and preferences.
